name: bloglist
description: a blog list application, that allows users to save information about interesting blogs they have stumbled across on the internet.

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../frotend/ && ng build --prod && cp -r dist/frotend ../backend
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && npm run deploy

author: feifei
